meanings.sent1: At the bakery, they sell dozens of delicious donuts every morning.
meanings.sent2: She bought dozens of colorful balloons for the party decorations.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she needed dozens of eyes to keep an eye on all the students.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with dozens of flowers, creating a vibrant sea of colors.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with dozens of books, waiting to be explored by eager readers.

meanings.definition: A large number or quantity, typically twelve or more
meanings.sent1: During the sale, shoppers grabbed dozens of discounted items.
meanings.sent2: There were dozens of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The chef needed dozens of eggs to prepare the giant omelette.
meanings.sent4: The concert hall was filled with dozens of excited fans, cheering for their favorite band.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with activity, with dozens of vendors selling fresh produce.
